text: chaur puok anak chreab tha avei del puok anak ttuol ban pi chyophond noh ku muoy pheak bram samreab a l laoh ning samreab anakneasar sach sar lohet robsa anakneasar kaunkamprea anak kreikr ning anakathveu damnaer dach sbieng brasenbae puok anak mean chomnue leu a l laoh ning avei del yeung ban banhchouh mk aoy khnhom robsa yeung now thngai bengchek( rveang khosa ning trauv) chea thngai del krom teangpir ban chuobaknea( now samorphoumi ba teur) . haey a l laoh mean anoupheap leu avei teangoasa
